scripts.start: pip install requirements.txt & npm run start-deploy
scripts.start-deploy: npx tailwindcss -i static/css/styles.css -o static/css/tailwind_styles.css --watch & python -m flask run
scripts.start-local: npx tailwindcss -i static/css/styles.css -o static/css/tailwind_styles.css --watch & python -m flask run
